solution.subtitle: Tap & Tell gives your guests a voice ‚Äî not just a pose. Every entry is a real moment, captured in their own words.

point1.title: Authentic, Not Staged

memories.title: In a World of Fleeting Content, Be Permanent
memories.subtitle: We live in an age where everything disappears ‚Äî stories, posts, messages. But the people in your life deserve more than an expiring story.
memories.paragraph1: Think about the last party you attended. You took photos. Maybe a selfie. But can you remember what anyone said to you? The feeling in the room? The inside joke that made everyone laugh?
memories.paragraph2: Tap & Tell exists because some things are worth more than a like. A guestbook entry is raw, personal, and real. It's the difference between a snapshot and a love letter.
memories.paragraph3: Years from now, you won't scroll through 10,000 photos. But you will open a guestbook and read the words of someone who cared enough to write them.
